identified-content.org: Peninsular and Oriental Steam Navigation Co

abstract.p: Peninsular and Oriental Steam Navigation Co says half-year net income jumped 17 percent, to 151 million pounds, or about $213 million; sales rose 19 percent, to 1.98 billion pounds, or $2.79 billion (S)

block.p: The British shipping and cruise line Peninsular and Oriental Steam Navigation Company said half-year net income jumped 17 percent, to $:151 million, or about $213 million, on strong gains in its ports unit and shipping joint venture. Sales rose 19 percent, to $:1.98 billion, or about $2.79 billion. Full-year profit for the shipping joint venture, P&O Nedlloyd will exceed analysts' expectations, the company said.

The British shipping and cruise line Peninsular and Oriental Steam Navigation Company said half-year net income jumped 17 percent, to $:151 million, or about $213 million, on strong gains in its ports unit and shipping joint venture. Sales rose 19 percent, to $:1.98 billion, or about $2.79 billion. Full-year profit for the shipping joint venture, P&O Nedlloyd will exceed analysts' expectations, the company said.
